turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order a cordusio from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i'm sorry, what was that drink again?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: unfortunately i don't see that on the starbucks menu.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I'd like to order a iced caffe americano.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure and what size did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, any milk in that for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. I want whipped cream on it though.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. I want some honey on it too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: please confirm, you'd like a venti iced cafe americano with whipped cream and honey. is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is correct. Can I pick it up at the Norlock Torino Plaza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to purchase now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what was the name of the starbucks you wanted to pick up at again?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good. Your drink will be ready at the Starbucks at the Nilwalk plaza in connecticut. Enjoy!
